user_query: I'm a freelance web developer and I'm working on a project that requires real-time cryptocurrency data. Can you provide me with the current ticker data for Ethereum in USD? Additionally, fetch the current price of Bitcoin and its timestamp. Moreover, suggest some reliable APIs that provide historical cryptocurrency data for analysis.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current ticker data for Ethereum in USD.
Fetch the current price of Bitcoin and its timestamp.
Suggest reliable APIs that provide historical cryptocurrency data for analysis.
